weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 💧I am wet!
🌧️ I fall from the clouds.
🎽 You wear a raincoat when I am here.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I give you light during the day.
🌻I am like a big, bright flower in the sky.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I am out.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
☁️ I can bring rain or sunshine.
🌬️ I move with the wind.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
🧤 You wear gloves when I am outside.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.

weather.question: I make the trees sway and blow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I make leaves fall down.
💨 You can fly a kite when I am here.
🌳 I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I come after the rain and have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, yellow, and blue.
☀️ You can see me when the sun shines through the rain.
✨ I'm a beautiful arc in the sky.

weather.question: I am loud and bright, and I come during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I flash in the sky.
⛈️ I come with thunder.
💥 I am very powerful.

weather.question: I'm very, very hot and big and far away. I give the Earth light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 Don't look directly at me, I'm very bright!
☀️ I help plants grow.
🌎 Earth goes around me.

weather.question: Sometimes I am hot, sometimes I am cold. The weather is always about me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️You can look at the weather report.
☔You can determine if you need an umbrella because of me.
💨I change all the time

weather.question: I am water that turns to ice in the cold, and fall from the sky, sometimes like little balls. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard.
🤕 Be careful, I can hurt if I fall on you!
🌨️ I am usually in thunderstorms.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes you can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sun and water to grow.
🥬 Rabbits love to eat me.
🥗 I can be part of your salad.

plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I need to be watered.
💐 You can give me as a gift.
🌻 Bees like to visit me

plant.question: I grow on a tree and I am yummy and red. You can take a bite! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me very much.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.
⚕️ They say I keep the doctor away

plant.question: I am big and tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🪵 I am made of wood.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and grow in the ground. You can eat me as a snack!

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love to eat me!
🥗 I am good in salads!
🌱 I need sun, water and ground to grow!

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. You can pop me and eat me at the movies! What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You eat me when you watch a movie.
🌽 I grow on a cob.
🐔 Chickens like to eat me

plant.question: I have pointy needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas! What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
🎁 You put presents under me.
⭐ You might put a star on top of me.

plant.question: I am a vine that grows yummy fruit. They are small and juicy! What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often purple or green.
🍷 You can make juice from me.
🧺 I grow in bunches

plant.question: I am a plant with a hard shell. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 You can drink my water.
🌴 I grow on a tall tree on the beach
🌰 I am very hard to open

plant.question: I am a yummy plant with big green leaves that you can cook. Popeye loves me! What am I?

hints.text: 💪 Eating me makes you strong.
🌿 I am a leafy green vegetable.
🍽️ You can eat me raw or cooked
